title: Functional Aromatherapy — REMIX Acupuncture
cleaned_text: FUNCTIONAL AROMATHERAPY The Aromatherapy Collection SPRITZ ANYTIME, ANYWHERE Aromatherapy works by telling our brain to chill. Our aromatherapy collection addresses some of the most common issues of our modern day — from restless sleep to jitters, focus to negative energy — these therapies were created to help you take a pause and a few deep breaths to recenter and balance. Spray in the environment, home, office, bedroom, car, or wherever you need peace.
